This is a sample text file for testing zhi CLI tools.

It contains multiple paragraphs that can be used to test file reading,
summarization, and translation features.

The zhi CLI is an agentic assistant powered by Zhipu GLM models. It supports
interactive chat, custom skills, and various file processing capabilities.

Key features:
- Interactive REPL with slash commands
- Custom skill creation and execution
- File reading, writing, and OCR
- Two-model architecture for cost optimization
